Title: Little Miss Sunshine
Overview: A family loaded with quirky, colorful characters piles into an old van and road trips to California for little Olive to compete in a beauty pageant.
Tagline: A family on the verge of a breakdown
Keywords: california, brother sister relationship, wife husband relationship, family's daily life, oscar award, highway, professor for literature, beauty contest, beauty queen contest, road trip, family relationships, family holiday, road movie, woman director, beauty pageant
production_companies: Fox Searchlight Pictures, Bona Fide Productions, Big Beach Films
Cast: Greg Kinnear, Toni Collette, Steve Carell
